NewLowPonit.Title: New lowpoint ! {name} for {current_price}
NewLowPonit.msg: {name} reached a new low point with the price of {current_price} cent befor that the lowest was {lowest_price} cent

ItGotCheaper.Title: {name} got cheaper
ItGotCheaper.msg: The price of {name} dropt from {last_price} to {current_price}, but the lowest was {lowest_price}
